channel.title: Npc Problems, (562)
channel.description: Hello, NPC problems. I go to a NPC such as a monster, and then i try to attack it, It doesn't do anything. The character just turns to face the monster, and doesn't attack it. The agressive npc's attack me, such as the tormented demon, but I cant attack them. Someone know how to solve this problem? Please help.

item.title: Npc Problems, (562)
item.dc:creator: @Buster09 Buster09
item.description:
@Buster09 wrote:

Hello, NPC problems. I go to a NPC such as a monster, and then i try to attack it, It doesn’t do anything. The character just turns to face the monster, and doesn’t attack it. The agressive npc’s attack me, such as the tormented demon, but I cant attack them. Someone know how to solve this problem? Please help.
